channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX7][DedicatedServers] - R710A01
item.description:
Jul 12, 20:40 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 12/07/2023 19:36 UTC
End time : 12/07/2023 20:21 UTC
Service status : Services are working as they should be.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power supply

Jul 12, 20:20 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 12, 19:45 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 12/07/2023 19:36 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack R710A01 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][OperatingSystem] - AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9 unavailable for Tyan S8026GM2NRE-HOV-B boards
item.description:
Jul 13, 07:18 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 12, 17:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 30/06/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9 can no longer be installed on Tyan S8026GM2NRE-HOV-B motherboards due to a kernel-related networking bug.
Root cause : A kernel update on AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9.
Ongoing actions : Our team is monitoring the upstream bug report at https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2222037
